mapper.insert: insert into member (Name, Id, Pw, Major, Student_Num, Email, Phone_Num, tal_Sta, goods_Sta, Email_2, Verify) values(#{Name}, #{Id}, #{Pw}, #{Major}, #{Student_Num}, #{Email}, #{Phone_Num}, 0, 0, #{Email_2}, 0)
mapper.select: select Name, Id, Pw, Major, Student_Num, Email, Phone_Num, tal_Sta, goods_Sta, Email_2, Verify from member where Id = #{Id} AND Pw = #{Pw}
select Id from member where Id = #{Id}
select trade_Code, trade_State, seller_Id, buyer_Id from trade where buyer_Id = #{Id} AND trade_State = 3 order by goods_Code desc
select Id, Pw, Name, Major, Email, Phone_Num, tal_Sta, goods_Sta, Student_Num, Email_2; from member where Id = #{Id}
